inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed diagnosis of locally advanced unresectable or metastatic soft tissue sarcoma; or (2) unresectable/metastatic GIST previously treated with imatinib mesylate and is documented to have drug resistance to imatinib mesylate treatment defined by tumor progression.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years and younger than or equal to 70 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease: defined as lesions that can be measured in at least one dimension by physical examination or medical imaging techniques. Ascites, pleural effusions, and bone marrow disease will not considered measurable disease.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have an ECOG performance status of less than or equal to 2.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have recovered (defined as toxicity less than grade 2) from toxic effects of all prior therapy before entering onto study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A treatment of drug free interval of at least 4 weeks since the last dose of chemotherapy or imatinib mesylate therapy is required.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: More than 4 weeks since prior radiotherapy is required.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function with an ANC greater than or equal to 1,500/ml, platelet count greater than or equal to 100,000/ ml (transfusion independent) and hemoglobin greater than or equal to 8.0 g/dl (transfusions permitted).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate renal function with serum creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate liver function, defined as bilirubin within 1.5 times the upper limit of normal, and liver transaminases within 2.5 times the upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must sign a document of informed consent indicating their awareness of the investigational nature and the risks of the study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have prior treatment with gemcitabine or taxane.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with brain or leptomeningeal metastases.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan who comes to clinic with some general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
